quote: Of course, these were only dreams. How could a sensible woman leave a happy marriage? All the same, a seductive voice from afar kept breaking into her conjugal peace: it was the voice of solitude.
quote_letters: OF COURSE THESE WERE ONLY DREAMS HOW COULD A SENSIBLE WOMAN LEAVE A HAPPY MARRIAGE ALL THE SAME A SEDUCTIVE VOICE FROM AFAR KEPT BREAKING INTO HER CONJUGAL PEACE IT WAS THE VOICE OF SOLITUDE
